content: the tree skirt measures about 4 feet across i used 2 skeins of tlc amore and about one third of the caron bliss skein the pattern is written so that you can make the design as large or as small as you like >this pattern is available for free at crochetkim com or by purchasing an ad-free print-ready version here click visit pattern website above or the link for more information below to see the free version
